RawLine: TNPC_31035001,先以{color=#cc0000}右鍵{/color}點擊趙姑娘出示，讓她看看這{color=#cc0000}玉石{/color}吧。,先以{color=#cc0000}右键{/color}点击赵姑娘出示，让她看看这{color=#cc0000}玉石{/color}吧。

Items.mt: First right click on Miss Zhao to show it to her, let her see the jade.
